title: How to flip pages in a PDF - Quora

response.answer_text: You can try using a PDF program to solve your problem. I’ll take PDFelement as the example to show you.  Open your PDF file, click on the “Page” tab and choose the pages you want to flip. Then move to the rotate icon as shown on the picture. You’ll be able to flip PDF pages as you want. Check here to see more details: How to Flip PDF Pages
AltoRotate - is online tool allows you to rotate PDF document pages for free. No downloads required. www.altorotatepdf.com

Aarush Rao's answer to Which is the best way to convert from PDF to Flipbook? This source will help to know that what is flipbook software and how you can flip pages PDF to flash, HTML according to your requirements. Visit PageTurnPro[.]com And test this Pro software as a free.
